entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
